Html:
hello,i am a student from chinese . now i want write a program in order to import my excel into database.but i don't know how to get the number of my excel's rows and columns,after 
$objPHPExcel = $objReader->load("mytest.xlsx");
please help me!

For the current worksheet, you can use
    $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getHighestRow();
and
    $objPHPExcel->getActiveSheet()->getHighestColumn();
